const subCategories={Educational:["Science","Literature","Art"],Inspirational:["Exercise","Goals","Money"],Love:["Family","Friends","Animals"]};const Quotes={"Quotes":[{"main":"Educational","sub":"Science","quote":"The important thing is not to stop questioning.
